contest-event.event-date:
Nov. 5, 2011 D Borders Entertainment Contest
Borders Entertainment Contest 0 Entertainments Contest
borders-entertainment-contest
None
2 Separate Adjudicator Boxes (Entertainments)
Buccleuch Centre, Langholm, Dumfries & Galloway, Scotland, UK 10th Edition
Adj A: Stan Lippeatt (tie-breaker) Adj B: Archie Hutchison Entertainment judge: Sarah Berker
First Prize: The Scottish Borders Trophy & £150 : Tullis Russell Mills Entertainment Prize: The Queen's Head Inn Shield & £150 Croy Silver
Best Second Section Band: The Souter Ronnie Trophy & £100 : Tullis Russell Mills Best Third Section Band: The John A. Wilson Memorial Trophy & £100 : Jedforest Instrumental Best Fourth Section Band: The Harry Pearce Memorial Trophy & £100 : Hawick Saxhorn Highest placed Borders Band: St Ronan's Bicentenary Trophy : St Ronan's
Best Soloist: The Walter Nichol Memorial Trophy & Medal : Irvine and Dreghorn Best Instrumentalist : The Jedforest Instrumental Band 150th Anniversary Trophy & Medal : Bass Trombone Coalburn Best Solo Cornet : The Dave Young Trophy & Medal: Dunaskin Doon Best Basses : The Bert Neil Memorial Quaich : Shotts St Patrick's Best Percussion : The Jenny Corbett Memorial Cup: Tullis Russell Mills
